description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Join a Mexican in his journey to America!  Play through many different cities of Mexico to try and get from the Yucatan Peninsula to the United States.  Also, play through the challenging bonus locations!  Everything was made by Angelo Pelini.   TheAwakeningProductions@hotmail.com
